# vtk_fortran_dataarray_encoder

> VTK file XMl writer, ascii local.
 ascii encoder
 binary encoder

**Source**: `src/third_party/VTKFortran/src/lib/vtk_fortran_dataarray_encoder.f90`

**Dependencies**

```mermaid
graph LR
  vtk_fortran_dataarray_encoder["vtk_fortran_dataarray_encoder"] --> befor64["befor64"]
  vtk_fortran_dataarray_encoder["vtk_fortran_dataarray_encoder"] --> penf["penf"]
```
